title: Amazon Essentials Men's Regular-Fit Crewneck T-Shirts, Long-Sleeve
description: REGULAR FIT: Experience comfort with our men's cotton t-shirt, designed with a regular fit that spans the shoulders, chest, and waist.
LIGHTWEIGHT COMFORT: Our cotton t-shirts for men are crafted from soft jersey knit fabric, providing breathability and making it a great lightweight option for any season.
CLASSIC STYLE: Elevate your wardrobe with this classic men's crewneck t-shirt, featuring a pull-on neckline that offers timeless style and versatility for all occasions.
COMFORTABLE DETAILS: Designed with ribbed neck trim and a tagless printed label for added comfort, these men's cotton t-shirts incorporate soft jersey-knit taping for a seamless feel.
IDEAL LENGTH: The ideal choice among t-shirts for men, effortlessly complementing your casual wardrobe.

Designed for those who appreciate casual elegance, this piece is made from soft, breathable cotton jersey, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking for a men's 100% cotton t-shirt. The classic crewneck design adds a versatile option to your wardrobe for any occasion. Embrace the easy, regular fit that flatters the shoulders, chest, and waist, providing a comfortable silhouette that adapts to your lifestyle. Crafted as part of the reliable line of cotton shirts for men, it features a lightweight t-shirt jersey knit, providing lasting comfort throughout the day. With attention to detail, it incorporates a ribbed neck trim and a tagless printed label for added convenience. The timeless pull-on crew neckline makes it a staple among crewneck t-shirts for men, offering effortless style whether you're dressing up or down. Ideal for layering or wearing solo, this tee embodies the essence of men's casual shirts, offering a go-to option for any laid-back outing or activity.
